# Gatekeep Israel (גייטקיפ)

> Professional electric fence solutions against wildlife (חיות בר) in Israel – wild boar (חזירי בר), rock hyrax (שפני סלע), and other pests. We install, maintain, and service electric fences for agriculture and residential properties nationwide. All team members are combat veterans (צבאיים).

## Company Overview

Gatekeep Israel (גייטקיפ) is an Israeli electric fence company based in Moshav Lachish, specializing in wildlife deterrence: wild boar (חזירי בר), rock hyrax (שפני סלע), porcupines, and foxes. We prevent agricultural damage (נזקים חקלאיים) and garden damage (נזקים לגינות). Founded by a third-generation farming family, our team of combat veterans (צבאיים) combines agricultural expertise, electrical engineering, and military discipline to deliver proven fencing solutions.

- Phone: 050-858-5310
- Location: Moshav Lachish, Southern District, Israel
- Website: https://gatekeepisrael.com

## Services

### Electric Fence Installation
Professional installation of electric fences for agricultural land and private homes. Includes site survey, system design, installation, and full warranty. Prices start from 10 NIS per meter.
URL: https://gatekeepisrael.com/installation

### Pricing
Transparent pricing for all fence types: agricultural, residential, and solar-powered systems. Online price calculator available.
URL: https://gatekeepisrael.com/pricing

### Solar Electric Fence
Autonomous solar-powered electric fence systems for remote areas without grid electricity. Operates 24/7 with battery backup.
URL: https://gatekeepisrael.com/solar-fence

### Home Solutions
Electric fence solutions designed for private homes and gardens. Safe for children and pets, discreet installation, effective against wild boar intrusions.
URL: https://gatekeepisrael.com/home-solutions

### Why Electric Fence
Comprehensive comparison of wild boar deterrence methods. Electric fences achieve 95%+ success rate vs. other methods.
URL: https://gatekeepisrael.com/why-electric-fence

### Service Areas
Nationwide coverage across Israel - from the Galilee to the Negev. Custom solutions for each region's terrain and soil conditions.
URL: https://gatekeepisrael.com/service-areas

## Blog Articles

### Wild Boar Crisis in Israel and Advanced Fencing Solutions
Comprehensive guide on the wild boar crisis in Israel - agricultural damage, health risks, and proven electric fence solutions.
URL: https://gatekeepisrael.com/blog/boar-history-israel

### Engineering Architecture and Technical Specifications of Advanced Electric Fencing Systems
In-depth engineering specifications including Energizer physics, Ultra-Low Impedance technology, autonomous solar systems, grounding mechanisms, and electrical safety.
URL: https://gatekeepisrael.com/blog/electrical-fence-technology

## Key Facts

- Over 95% success rate in wild boar deterrence
- Service all regions of Israel
- Third-generation farming family background
- All team members are combat veterans (IDF)
- Systems comply with Israeli safety standards
- Solar options available for off-grid locations
- 24-48 hour response time from site survey to quote
- 1-3 day average installation time
- Full warranty included with all installations

## Technology

Electric fences work by creating a psychological and physical barrier. Short high-voltage, low-current pulses teach wild boars to permanently avoid the protected area. Systems include:
- Energizer units (mains or solar powered)
- High-tensile wire conductors
- Professional grounding systems adapted to soil type
- Insulators rated for Israeli climate conditions
- Monitoring and alert systems

## Language

Primary content language: Hebrew (he), right-to-left (RTL)
